title: ssh: TestServerWindow hangs with GOMAXPROCS>>1
body:
GOMAXPROCS=86 go test -v code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh

=== RUN TestCipherReversal-86
--- PASS: TestCipherReversal-86 (0.00 seconds)
=== RUN TestDefaultCiphersExist-86
--- PASS: TestDefaultCiphersExist-86 (0.00 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientAuthPublickey-86
--- PASS: TestClientAuthPublickey-86 (0.18 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientAuthPassword-86
--- PASS: TestClientAuthPassword-86 (0.17 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientAuthWrongPassword-86
--- PASS: TestClientAuthWrongPassword-86 (0.17 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientAuthInvalidPublickey-86
--- PASS: TestClientAuthInvalidPublickey-86 (0.15 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientAuthRSAandDSA-86
--- PASS: TestClientAuthRSAandDSA-86 (0.16 seconds)
=== RUN TestClientHMAC-86
--- PASS: TestClientHMAC-86 (0.32 seconds)
=== RUN TestFuncPasswordAuth-86
--- PASS: TestFuncPasswordAuth-86 (0.00 seconds)
        client_func_test.go:25: ssh.user not defined, skipping test
=== RUN TestFuncPublickeyAuth-86
--- PASS: TestFuncPublickeyAuth-86 (0.00 seconds)
        client_func_test.go:43: ssh.user not defined, skipping test
=== RUN TestSafeString-86
--- PASS: TestSafeString-86 (0.00 seconds)
=== RUN TestIntLength-86
--- PASS: TestIntLength-86 (0.00 seconds)
=== RUN TestMarshalUnmarshal-86
--- PASS: TestMarshalUnmarshal-86 (0.05 seconds)
=== RUN TestServerWindow-86

hangs
